p:
Georefenced and time-stamped phylogenies were constructed using a discrete phylogeographic approach as previously described.
19
,
22 In brief, countries were grouped into four geographic regions consisting of Brazil (n = 86), Central America and Mexico (n = 45), South America (n = 132) and Caribbean (n = 173). Inferred locations at each internal node and corresponding dated phylogenies trees were estimated using BEAST1.10.
23 MCMC convergence was inspected using Tracer.v1.7 and summary trees were generated using TreeAnnotator.
23
